溮字的基本解释

溮
shī
见“浉”。

溮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shī］
［《集韻》霜夷切，平脂，生。］
“浉1”的繁体字。
水名。在河南省南部。源出河南、湖北两省边境桐柏山支脉，东北流入淮河。长131公里。

溮字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　溮； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页640第27
【集韻】霜夷切，音師。水名。【水經注】溮水，源出大潰山。　又【佩觿集】溮則，申州川名。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shī]
["Jiyun" Shuangyi cut, flat fat, raw. ]
"浉1" in traditional characters.
Water name. In the south of Henan Province. It originates from the branch of Tongbai Mountain on the border of Henan and Hubei provinces, and flows into the Huaihe River in the northeast. It is 131 kilometers long.
Pu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　溮; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 640 27
[Jiyun] Shuangyi cut, sound engineer. Water name. [Notes on Water Classics] Pushui originates from Da Kui Mountain.　[Pei Gu Ji] Pu Ze, the name of Shenzhou and Sichuan.
